title: “Amazon Unbound” author Brad Stone on the mind of Bezos, the future of Amazon & more | E1282
description: Brad Stone, the author of "Amazon Unbound", joined to talk about Elon Musk (09:44), Amazon's workplace environment (23:25), the importance of Prime (27:17), which tech companies are most dangerous for society (51:13), & more!
